resources.string: Please select folder containing game data files:
No Stratagus data files were found in

Stratagus is a real-time strategy gaming engine.
\ Games which use Stratagus: Wargus (Warcraft II clone), \ Stargus (partial Starcraft I clone) - both games use content from original Blizzard CDs; Aleona's Tales.
\ To actually play anything you will need to generate 'game data files' on your PC and copy them to your device.
\ Please visit http://stratagus.drodin.com for instructions.
\ Note: 'game data files' generated for the previos version of Stratagus (0.8.5 beta) are not compatible with the current version (2.4.3)!
